person.content:

Paragraph: Blinker was fined 75,000 Swiss francs ( $ 57,600 ) for failing to inform the Engllsh club of his previous commitment to Udinese .

| Person |
| --- |
| Blinker |
| the Engllsh club (could not determine the exact name of the club) |
| Udinese |

Note: I assumed "Blinker" is a person, as it is the common practice to use a person's name when discussing fines and commitments in sports. However, if "Blinker" refers to something else, please let me know.
